instruction: Name all the characters in the given book.
input: Book title: Harry Potter and The Chamber of Secrets
output: Harry Potter, Ron Weasley, Hermione Granger, Ginny Weasley, Draco Malfoy, Albus Dumbledore, Minerva McGonagall, Hagrid, Lord Voldemort, Professor Quirrell, Aunt Petunia, Uncle Vernon, Gilderoy Lockhart, Lucius Malfoy, Sirius Black, Aragog, Professor Sprout, Gringotts goblins, Professor Lupin, Dumbledore’s Army, Dobby, Cornelius Fudge, Professor Sinistra, Moaning Myrtle, Tom Riddle, Argus Filch, Bellatrix Lestrange, Fenrir Greyback, Bartemius Crouch Jr., Arthemus Dumbledore.
